text: Sergey Chernyshev (born 13 May 1988) is a Russian rugby union player who generally plays as a prop represents Russia internationally. He was included in the Russian squad for the 2019 Rugby World Cup which was held in Japan for the first time and also marks his first World Cup appearance. == Career == Sergey made his international debut for Russia against Hong Kong on 8 November 2014. == References == Category:Russian rugby union players Category:Russia international rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:Sportspeople from Moscow Category:Rugby union hookers Category:Rugby union props
title: Sergey Chernyshev (rugby union)
